hero-sub1: I'm an IT student building interactive web apps and experimenting with UI/UX design as well as backend setups.
hero-sub2: I specialize in front- and back-end development, I enjoy turning ideas into engaging digital experiences I also enjoy making games!
project-description-realm:
REALM is a TTRPG (tabletop role-playing game) inspired by Dungeons & Dragons. The project is under active development and is structured as logically separated services within a monorepo using TypeScript, Node.js, and Phaser.js.

I designed and implemented the networking layer from scratch using WebSockets. The game is structured around classic fantasy races and classes, with an emphasis on teamwork and cooperative gameplay.
project-description-dgd: Deal Gone Dark is a 2D stealth action game where players take on the role of a robber infiltrating a casino. The game features pre-generated levels, full 2-5 player multiplayer support. Developed using TypeScript and Phaser.js with Colyseus as the server, the project focuses on creating an enjoyable experience with semi-dynamic lighting and sound design.
project-description-agentq: AgentQ was based on popular quiz websites like Redmenta and Quizlet. It allows users to create, share, and play quizzes in a competitive multiplayer environment. Built with TypeScript, React, and Node.js, the project emphasizes user engagement through an agent style quiz taker website
